name: Untitled Caterpillar Game
description:
Walk with A/D, jump with Space, face a box and hold Left Shift to grab it.

If you get trapped somehow you can press R to reset to the last checkpoint.

This game uses the following sounds from freesound.org:

https://freesound.org/people/swordofkings128/sounds/398032/
https://freesound.org/people/leosalom/sounds/234288/
https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/484266/
